title: [Solhaven, Zelia's Court]
description: A low wall, constructed of various-sized stones, boards and odd pieces of refuse, surrounds a small plot of land between the end of the paved road and the canal.  A statue of a monkey, almost as tall as a halfling, squats in the middle of the lot, while a middle-aged woman dressed in drab, threadbare robes and an oversized horned helm putters tirelessly about the area, apparently unperturbed by the darkness.

A low wall, constructed of various-sized stones, boards and odd pieces of refuse, surrounds a small plot of land between the end of the paved road and the canal.  A statue of a monkey, almost as tall as a halfling, squats in the middle of the lot, while a middle-aged woman dressed in drab, threadbare robes and an oversized horned helm putters tirelessly about the area.  A half dozen or so brick-bordered patches of weeds show evidence of unskilled and even detrimental attention.
